page.title: 05EGLOSKERRY CHURCH.(Cont.)
page.content: The church was last restored in 1886.We found the graveyard a most interesting place.There were well over 200 graves.It was difficult to count them because some didn't have headstones and some plots held more than one body.The oldest headstone we found was in the porch and about a John Barne of Bodharlocke who died in 1624.It was in old fashioned writing and spelling.The newest grave was of the local vicar,the Rev.Patrick Howlett who died in August 1985.We found these names on headstones,whose families are still in the area today:- {FRANCIS, BURDEN,COLVILLE,FRAYN,SMART and{CORY. The names on these headstones are of families who are no longer in the district today:-{GEAKE,COUCH,JENKINS, {FACY,BLYTHE,SLEEMAN,KITTOW}and{HOLMAN.
